chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
Nineteen Which schools can they send their relatives to, if they want?

If any of the priests wishes to send his nephew or any relative to a school, whether it be in the church of the Holy Cross, the monastery of Saint Anianus, Saint Benedict, Saint Lifardus, or any of the other monasteries granted to us to manage, we grant him permission to do so.
chunks.original_latin:
XIX. Ad quas scholas mittere consanguineos suos possint,
si velint. Si quis ex presbyteris voluerit nepotem suum,
aut aliquem consanguineum, ad scholam mittere,
in ecclesia Sanctae Crucis, aut in monasterio
Sancti Aniani, aut Sancti Benedicti, aut Sancti
Lifardi, aut in caeteris de his coenobiis quae nobis ad
regendum concessa sunt, ei licentiam id faciendi
concedimus.
